cover_page.title: 🎓 COAL Project Allocation
cover_page.content:
Each group must have at least 1 member and no more than 3 members.

The project proposal must include the following details:
     Project title
    Names and roll numbers of all group members
    Objective of the project
   Tools or platform to be used (e.g., 8086 MASM, TASM, NASM)
   Brief description or flow of how the project will work
   Expected output, including an example of input and result

form_header.title: COAL Project Selection Form
form_header.description: Please fill in all required fields to submit your project group allocation. All fields marked with * are mandatory.
